page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN THE AREA (part3)
page.content: Old industries in the area include a brush works,a firm making bungs for beer barrels,the maltings and a chemical works which now makes insecticides.More modern firms include one making sports cars,several firms making fitted bedroom and kitchen furniture,2 firms which found a use for waste ash from the Thornhill Power Station and started making concrete blocks used by the building trade and a firm making all types of furniture.Modern industrial units have been and are been constructed on an industrial site at Ravensthorpe.Some of these units are occupied by haulage and furniture firms.It is interesting to see that most of these modern buildings are designed to accommodate small and very small firms.Many small firms prefer older buildings & small overheads to modern premises.
